title: Maxidix Wifi Suite v13.5.28 Build 491 Final
description:
Maxidix Wifi Suite v13.5.28 Build 491 Final Installer - 2010kaiser
         ==================================================================


                 N.B.: THIS INSTALLER MUST BE RAN AS ADMINISTRATOR
                 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



Maxidix Wifi Suite - utility gives you full control over Wi-Fi connections and wireless networks. This professional application suite for full control of wireless networks and viewing of complex information about the connection and traffic counts. The tool automatically detects the connection and allows you to easily manage, allows you to configure profiles.


Features:
=========


Automatic connection to the network:
====================================

Easily customized events to automatically connect to a network or a wireless access point (WAP), which will connect automatically whenever needed network or WAP appears near your location.

Geography:
==========

Determine your current location using the information provided by the surrounding Wi-Fi networks. Wi-Fi Suite collects information from nearby networks and detects the location using Google Geolocation.

Quick connect to the network:
=============================
The speed of the connection to the Wi-Fi networks to 6 times faster than normal. Wi-Fi Suite uses an optimized algorithm for communication, which reduces connection time, especially when connected to the new network.

Import and Export network profiles:
===================================

With Maxidix Wifi Suite you can export your Wi-Fi profile and save them for later use. For example, you can backup and restore access to the brand new after you reinstall the operating system.

Accuracy of Information:
========================

Wifi Suite gives you all the information available on Wi-Fi networks and network profiles and the quality of the signal with high accuracy. Over 80 characteristics Wi-Fi connections, including the characteristics of each point in each network.

Whats new:
==========
Hot Spot feature introduced. This features allows you to turn your computer with Windows 7 of higher OS into a real WI-FI router. Host your WI-FI network, share Internet and more.

New feature: 
============

- Ad hoc master. Allows you to make and host ad hoc network in one click. Even in Windows 8, which is not include tool for making ad hoc profiles.
- Wi-Fi profiles improved
- Interface improvements
- Windows 8 compatibility
- IP profiles enhancements
- Automatic connections improvements: fixed a bug with automatic connections after sleep / hibernate on some systems
- Network statistics performance improvements
- New translations to Dutch, Slovenian
- Geolocation feature is not supported, due to the closing of free access to geolocation services by Google

INFO:
=====

Year: 2013
Version: v13.5.28 build 491
Developer: Copyright 2013 Maxidix
Architecture: x32bit  x64bit

System Requirements:
====================

Windows XP / 2003 / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
